labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Only the image or thumbnail show, not both.
data.expected_result: Both the thumbnail and image show fine. (Shows fine in Stable 9072)
data.short_description: Rich Embeds don't show the thumbnail most of the time if there's an image
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot send an embed with both an image and a thumbnail - Watch as either the thumbnail or image don't show.
